Original Title: Moonstruck
Year: 1987
Duration: 102 min .
Country: United States
Directed: Norman Jewison
Written: John Patrick Shanley
Music: Dick Hyman
Photo: David Watkin
Starring: Cher, Nicolas Cage, Olympia Dukakis, Danny Aiello, Vincent Gardenia, John Mahoney, Julie Bovasso
Studio: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
Comedy.Drama. Romance | Romantic comedy

Synopsis:
---------
Loretta, a widow of Italian origin who lives in New York , decides to marry Johnny, a bachelor of weak character who drives at will. Suddenly, Johnny has to go to Sicily to visit his sick mother, then asks Loretta to take care of the wedding invite his brother Ronnie, which is spaced in a while.

Awards:
-------
1987: 3 Oscars: Actress ( Cher), Supporting Actress (Dukakis), original script.6 nominations
1988: Berlin Film Festival: Silver Bear-Best Director
1987: David di Donatello Awards: Best Foreign Actress (Cher)
1988: BAFTA: 4 nominations, including Best Actress (Cher)
